articles.author: Michelle Starr
articles.title: Abnormal Surge of Brain Abscesses in American Children, CDC Says - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Following the easing of pandemic restrictions in the US, cases of brain abscess in children under 18 have risen to new heights, according to a pair of CDC reports.
articles.content:
Following the easing of pandemic restrictions in the US, cases of brain abscess in children under 18 have risen to new heights, according to a pair of CDC reports.
